collections.name: awards_coaches

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for each award entry.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year the award was given.

properties.name: coachid
properties.description: Identifier for the coach who received the award.

properties.name: award
properties.description: The name of the award, such as 'NBA Coach of the Year' or 'ABA Coach of the Year'.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league, primarily 'NBA' or 'ABA'.

properties.name: note
properties.description: Additional notes about the award. A value of 'tie' indicates the award was shared.

collections.description: Records of annual awards given to coaches.

collections.name: awards_players

properties.name: playerid
properties.description: Identifier for the player who received the award.

properties.name: award
properties.description: The name of the award.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year the award was given.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league, such as 'NBA' or 'ABA'.

properties.name: note
properties.description: Additional notes about the award. A value of 'tie' indicates the award was shared.

properties.name: pos
properties.description: The player's position for which the award was given (e.g., 'C' for Center, 'F' for Forward, 'G' for Guard).

collections.description: Records of annual awards given to players.

collections.name: coaches

properties.name: coachid
properties.description: Unique identifier for the coach.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year of the season.

properties.name: tmid
properties.description: Identifier for the team the coach worked for.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league, such as 'NBA' or 'ABA'.

properties.name: stint
properties.description: Indicates the coach's tenure with the team within that year, used for mid-season coaching changes.

properties.name: won
properties.description: Number of regular season games won.

properties.name: lost
properties.description: Number of regular season games lost.

properties.name: post_wins
properties.description: Number of post-season (playoff) games won.

properties.name: post_losses
properties.description: Number of post-season (playoff) games lost.

collections.description: Yearly coaching statistics for each coach and team.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: If a coach's post-season wins and losses are both zero, it implies that their team did not participate in the post-season (playoffs) that year.

collections.name: draft

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for each draft pick entry.

properties.name: draftyear
properties.description: The year of the draft.

properties.name: draftround
properties.description: The round in which the player was drafted. A value of 0 indicates no draft information for that year.

properties.name: draftselection
properties.description: The player's selection number within the draft round. A value of 0 indicates no specific selection information.

properties.name: draftoverall
properties.description: The player's overall draft position for the year.

properties.name: tmid
properties.description: Identifier of the team that drafted the player.

properties.name: firstname
properties.description: First name of the drafted player.

properties.name: lastname
properties.description: Last name of the drafted player.

properties.name: suffixname
properties.description: Suffix for the player's name (e.g., 'Jr.').

properties.name: playerid
properties.description: Unique identifier for the player, if they are in the players table.

properties.name: draftfrom
properties.description: The college or team the player was drafted from.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league conducting the draft, mainly 'NBA' or 'ABA'.

collections.description: Information about players selected in the draft each year.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A draftRound of 1 and draftSelection of 7 means the player was the 7th pick in the 1st round.

collections.name: player_allstar

properties.name: playerid
properties.description: Unique identifier for the player.

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The player's last name.

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The player's first name.

properties.name: season_id
properties.description: The year of the All-Star game season.

properties.name: conference
properties.description: The conference the player represented, typically 'East' or 'West'.

properties.name: league_id
properties.description: Identifier for the league, 'NBA' or 'ABA'.

properties.name: games_played
properties.description: Number of All-Star games played in that season, which is usually 1.

properties.name: minutes
properties.description: Total minutes played in the All-Star game.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Total points scored.

properties.name: o_rebounds
properties.description: Number of offensive rebounds.

properties.name: d_rebounds
properties.description: Number of defensive rebounds.

properties.name: rebounds
properties.description: Total number of rebounds (offensive + defensive).

properties.name: assists
properties.description: Total number of assists.

properties.name: steals
properties.description: Total number of steals.

properties.name: blocks
properties.description: Total number of blocks.

properties.name: turnovers
properties.description: Total number of turnovers.

properties.name: personal_fouls
properties.description: Total number of personal fouls.

properties.name: fg_attempted
properties.description: Number of field goals attempted.

properties.name: fg_made
properties.description: Number of field goals made.

properties.name: ft_attempted
properties.description: Number of free throws attempted.

properties.name: ft_made
properties.description: Number of free throws made.

properties.name: three_attempted
properties.description: Number of three-point shots attempted.

properties.name: three_made
properties.description: Number of three-point shots made.

collections.description: Statistics for players participating in All-Star games for a given season.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: Total rebounds is the sum of offensive rebounds (o_rebounds) and defensive rebounds (d_rebounds).

collections.name: players

properties.name: playerid
properties.description: Unique identifier for the player.

properties.name: usefirst
properties.description: The player's commonly used first name.

properties.name: firstname
properties.description: The player's legal first name.

properties.name: middlename
properties.description: The player's middle name.

properties.name: lastname
properties.description: The player's last name.

properties.name: namegiven
properties.description: The player's given name.

properties.name: fullgivenname
properties.description: The player's full given name, which may include former names.

properties.name: namesuffix
properties.description: Suffix for the player's name (e.g., 'Jr.', 'III').

properties.name: namenick
properties.description: The player's nickname(s).

properties.name: pos
properties.description: The player's primary position(s) (e.g., 'C' for Center, 'F' for Forward, 'G' for Guard).

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: Some players can have two positions simultaneously.

properties.name: firstseason
properties.description: The first season the player played.

properties.name: lastseason
properties.description: The last season the player played.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Player's height in inches.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Player's weight in pounds (lbs).

properties.name: college
properties.description: The primary college the player attended.

properties.name: collegeother
properties.description: Other colleges the player may have attended or transferred from.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: Some players may have a record of transferring from other colleges.

properties.name: birthdate
properties.description: The player's date of birth.

properties.name: birthcity
properties.description: The city where the player was born.

properties.name: birthstate
properties.description: The state where the player was born.

properties.name: birthcountry
properties.description: The country where the player was born.

properties.name: highschool
properties.description: The high school the player attended.

properties.name: hscity
properties.description: The city of the player's high school.

properties.name: hsstate
properties.description: The state of the player's high school.

properties.name: hscountry
properties.description: The country of the player's high school.

properties.name: deathdate
properties.description: The player's date of death. A value of '0000-00-00' indicates the player is still alive.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A deathDate of '0000-00-00' indicates the player is still alive.

properties.name: race
properties.description: The player's race (e.g., 'B' for Black, 'W' for White).

collections.description: Biographical and demographic information for all players.

collections.name: players_teams

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for this record.

properties.name: playerid
properties.description: Identifier for the player.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year of the season.

properties.name: stint
properties.description: The player's period of time with the team in that season.

properties.name: tmid
properties.description: Identifier for the team.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league.

properties.name: gp
properties.description: Games played during the regular season. A value of 82 indicates full attendance.

properties.name: gs
properties.description: Games started during the regular season. If GS equals GP, the player was always in the starting lineup.

properties.name: minutes
properties.description: Total minutes played in the regular season.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Total points scored in the regular season.

properties.name: orebounds
properties.description: Offensive rebounds in the regular season.

properties.name: drebounds
properties.description: Defensive rebounds in the regular season.

properties.name: rebounds
properties.description: Total rebounds in the regular season (offensive + defensive).

properties.name: assists
properties.description: Total assists in the regular season.

properties.name: steals
properties.description: Total steals in the regular season.

properties.name: blocks
properties.description: Total blocks in the regular season.

properties.name: turnovers
properties.description: Total turnovers in the regular season.

properties.name: pf
properties.description: Personal fouls in the regular season.

properties.name: fgattempted
properties.description: Field goals attempted in the regular season.

properties.name: fgmade
properties.description: Field goals made in the regular season.

properties.name: ftattempted
properties.description: Free throws attempted in the regular season.

properties.name: ftmade
properties.description: Free throws made in the regular season.

properties.name: threeattempted
properties.description: Three-point shots attempted in the regular season.

properties.name: threemade
properties.description: Three-point shots made in the regular season.

properties.name: postgp
properties.description: Games played during the post-season (playoffs).

properties.name: postgs
properties.description: Games started during the post-season.

properties.name: postminutes
properties.description: Total minutes played in the post-season.

properties.name: postpoints
properties.description: Total points scored in the post-season.

properties.name: postorebounds
properties.description: Offensive rebounds in the post-season.

properties.name: postdrebounds
properties.description: Defensive rebounds in the post-season.

properties.name: postrebounds
properties.description: Total rebounds in the post-season.

properties.name: postassists
properties.description: Total assists in the post-season.

properties.name: poststeals
properties.description: Total steals in the post-season.

properties.name: postblocks
properties.description: Total blocks in the post-season.

properties.name: postturnovers
properties.description: Total turnovers in the post-season.

properties.name: postpf
properties.description: Personal fouls in the post-season.

properties.name: postfgattempted
properties.description: Field goals attempted in the post-season.

properties.name: postfgmade
properties.description: Field goals made in the post-season.

properties.name: postftattempted
properties.description: Free throws attempted in the post-season.

properties.name: postftmade
properties.description: Free throws made in the post-season.

properties.name: postthreeattempted
properties.description: Three-point shots attempted in the post-season.

properties.name: postthreemade
properties.description: Three-point shots made in the post-season.

properties.name: note
properties.description: Additional notes for the record.

collections.description: Contains player statistics for each team they played on in a given year, covering both regular and post-season games.

commonsense evidence.rebound_calculation: Total rebounds is the sum of offensive rebounds (oRebounds) and defensive rebounds (dRebounds).
commonsense evidence.full_attendance: If GP (Games Played) is 82, it signifies full attendance for the regular season.
commonsense evidence.starting_lineup: When GP (Games Played) equals GS (Games Started), it means the player was in the starting lineup for every game they played.

collections.name: series_post

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for the series record.

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year the series took place.

properties.name: round_
properties.description: The round of the playoffs (e.g., 'F' for Finals, 'SF' for Semi-Finals, 'QF' for Quarter-Finals, 'DF' for Division Finals).

properties.name: series
properties.description: Identifier for the series.

properties.name: tmidwinner
properties.description: The team ID of the series winner.

properties.name: lgidwinner
properties.description: The league ID of the winning team.

properties.name: tmidloser
properties.description: The team ID of the series loser.

properties.name: lgidloser
properties.description: The league ID of the losing team.

properties.name: w
properties.description: Number of wins for the winning team in the series.

properties.name: l
properties.description: Number of losses for the winning team (which equals wins for the losing team) in the series.

collections.description: Results of post-season (playoff) series, including the winner and loser of each series.

collections.name: teams

properties.name: year_
properties.description: The year of the season.

properties.name: lgid
properties.description: Identifier for the league (e.g., 'NBL', 'NBA').

properties.name: tmid
properties.description: Unique identifier for the team in that year.

properties.name: franchid
properties.description: Identifier for the franchise, which remains consistent across years and team name changes.

properties.name: confid
properties.description: Identifier for the conference (e.g., 'EC' for Eastern Conference, 'WC' for Western Conference).

properties.name: divid
properties.description: Identifier for the division.

properties.name: rank
properties.description: The team's rank within its division.

properties.name: confrank
properties.description: The team's rank within its conference.

properties.name: playoff
properties.description: Indicates if the team made the playoffs and how far they advanced. A non-empty value means they attended the playoffs.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The full name of the team for that year.

properties.name: o_fgm
properties.description: Offensive field goals made by the team during the season.

properties.name: o_ftm
properties.description: Offensive free throws made by the team during the season.

properties.name: o_pts
properties.description: Total offensive points scored by the team.

properties.name: d_pts
properties.description: Total defensive points allowed by the team.

properties.name: homewon
properties.description: Number of games won at home.

properties.name: homelost
properties.description: Number of games lost at home.

properties.name: awaywon
properties.description: Number of games won away.

properties.name: awaylost
properties.description: Number of games lost away.

properties.name: won
properties.description: Total number of games won in the regular season.

properties.name: lost
properties.description: Total number of games lost in the regular season.

properties.name: games
properties.description: Total number of games played in the regular season.

properties.name: arena
properties.description: The name of the team's home arena.

collections.description: Yearly statistics and information for each team.

relationships.name: awards_coaches
relationships.description: Awards received by this coach in a specific year.

relationships.name: coaches
relationships.description: The coach who received the award.

relationships.name: awards_players
relationships.description: Awards received by this player.

relationships.name: player
relationships.description: The player who received the award.

relationships.name: coaches
relationships.description: Coaches for this team in a specific year.

relationships.name: team
relationships.description: The team associated with this coaching record.

relationships.name: draft
relationships.description: Players drafted by this team in a specific year.

relationships.name: drafting_team
relationships.description: The team that made this draft selection.

relationships.name: player_allstar
relationships.description: All-Star game appearances for this player.

relationships.name: player
relationships.description: The player associated with this All-Star game record.

relationships.name: players_teams
relationships.description: Player statistics for this team in a specific year.

relationships.name: team
relationships.description: The team for which these player statistics were recorded.

relationships.name: team_seasons
relationships.description: The yearly team statistics for this player.

relationships.name: player
relationships.description: The player associated with these team statistics.

relationships.name: losing_series
relationships.description: Post-season series where this team was the loser.

relationships.name: losing_team
relationships.description: The team that lost this post-season series.

relationships.name: winning_series
relationships.description: Post-season series where this team was the winner.

relationships.name: winning_team
relationships.description: The team that won this post-season series.

relationships.name: draft_details
relationships.description: Details of the draft in which the player was selected.

relationships.name: player
relationships.description: The player who was drafted.

relationships.name: coaching_seasons
relationships.description: Coaching seasons for this person, if they were also a coach.

relationships.name: player_record
relationships.description: The player record for this coach, if they were also a player.
